post.summary: The data behind the business combinations page, https://www.calcbench.com/businesscombinations

post.description: The search behind the disclosures page. To get all results keep calling with nextGroupStartOffset from the previous response, until moreResults is false. Retrieving the document contents varies depending on the type of document returned.

get.summary: Gets the list of statements for one company/period
As-reported face statments, income, balance, statement of cash flows, etc...
get.description: This is data behind the calcbench Company-In-Detail page. Formerly known as api/asReported

parameters.name: pointInTime
parameters.description: As originally reported, without revisions, defaults to false

post.description: The data behind the raw data page.
The data behind the non-XBRL raw data page.
The data behind the 13F data page.

post.summary: Get data for individual tags on the multi-company page.

DimensionalDataPoint.description: Returned by calls to the dimensional(segment) API end-point

dimensions.description: Keys are the axis names, values are the member names.

DimensionalSearchParameters.description: The arguments for the Segment API end-point

AsOriginallyReported.description: Show the first reported, rather than revised, values

limit.description: Maximum number of results to get

AllTextBlocks.description: Get all of the XBRL text blocks

AllMDASections.description: Get all MDA sections for a single filing

FilingID.description: For non-XBRL proxy filings, etc.  Specifying this will get you all the documents for the company/period that the document is associated with in the SECFiling table.

StatementsMetaData.description: The face statements for a company/period along with some stuff to render the CID page

APIXBRLStatement.description: Income statement, balance sheet, statement of cash flows, etc.

metric_id.description: qname_id_min, a unique identifier for XBRL tags.  Set for rows when Calcbench thinks this data corresponds to an XBRL tag.
